EN:
Today, I met with my sister and good friends to come to this restaurant with an excellent atmosphere. It is really a surprise night!Very beautiful shop.The ingredients are very particular.

Every dish here is full of creativity and unique flavor.First of all, we ordered "the duck falling into the fire". The duck meat is tender and smooth, and the taste is rich. Every bite makes us love.I especially love "Axin falls in love with Ah", and the sweetness of corn bamboo shoots makes me fall in love instantly and can't stop at all.The cooking method of chicken heart and chicken æ–™ completely subverts your imagination.It will not make you feel that your teeth are bad and you can't bite.

We also tried the signature dish "Burning Noodles". The strong spicy taste made people appetite. The sweet blend of special sauce, with fried preserved eggs, is really a perfect match, let us be addicted.The second bowl was called.In addition, the "Mo -thief's foreign wind fried noodles" also surprised us. The taste is refreshing but flavorful.

Red curry soft shell crab salad is also our favorite. Thai hot and sour sauce is simply the carnival of taste buds.In the end, we tasted "beef tongue". The beef tongue of this dish is incredible, the filling is delicious, the beef tongue is soft and tender, and it is elastic.At the same time, it is very thick, not the kind of thin one.The outer layer has a crispy texture of sesame cakes, with a touch of sweetness, full of layers, so that we can eat satisfied.

The decoration of this restaurant is nothing to say. Each corner is full of exquisite design sense, which is very suitable for taking pictures and punching.Their drinks are also very rich, especially bartending, let us talk while drinking, and slip away without knowing time.There is also a area that can be charged on the second floor. The environment is comfortable and spacious.

Boss Ajie has his own ideas for his food and meal wine. Whether it is food cooking or wine, it is perfect.

This is the ideal place to spend a good time with the object of the favorite person, no matter who and who you can feel the romantic atmosphere.But remind you, do not receive children under the age of 12!Take your friends to experience the food and atmosphere here!

Today, I will come to this super -atmospheric restaurant with my good friends today. I really want to recommend it to everyone!
The dishes inside make people feel full of ingenuity, especially the "duck falling into the fire", which is cooked into ducks for 14 days, tender and juicy, and the entrance is melted. It is really unforgettable.And my girlfriend Julie's favorite is the dish named "Axin falls in love with Ah". The duck heart, ducky, corn bamboo shoots inside are sweet and delicious, making people can't help but take a bite.

We also ordered "Cao Cao's egg burning noodles", and the spicy taste really forced me to eat three bowls in a row!Especially their sauces, spicy in the fragrance, and the embellishment of fried preserved eggs, are definitely letting the population flow.There is also "ink thief's foreign wind fried noodles", which has a rich taste and layered, with a special flavor, which is particularly interesting.

In addition, the red curry soft shell crab salad is equipped with Thai -style sauce, hot and sour appetizers, and each bite makes people feel good value.In the end, we also tasted the "two sides of the beef tongue". The beef tongue of this dish is really tender. The entrance is melted. It is accompanied by a cake -like outer skin.

This shop is really suitable for check -in and take pictures, every corner inside is very filming!In addition, their drinking choices are also very rich, and drinks with alcohol are particularly suitable for friends with friends.

There is also the charter area on the second floor.You can also have a bartender for you to bartender.

This is really a good place with your favorite object. Whether it is a girl you like or a boy, you will definitely make a good spark!

But pay attention, do not receive children under the age of 12!Take your friends to enjoy it!

The best straight fire dishes in Taipei!
Both steaks and all ducks are very standard. The cooked duck meat is very soft and tender. The outer skin passes through the straight fire barbecue crispy oil, and it tastes richer and stunning.
The ribs of the ribs of the furnace are very good, the meat is also soft and juicy, the portion is very large, the price is not expensive, and the friend's dinner is very cost -effective.
